surrogate.notes: Digital images commissioned by the Harvard Graduate School of Design and Aga Kahn Agency for Habitat to support the site research of STU1503: Extreme Urbanism VII: Imagining an Urban Future for Ishkashim (fall 2020). All photos were taken in October of 2020 by a hired Kabul team of professional photographers. The studio sought to imagine an urban future for Ishkashim which addressed the physical, social, cultural, ecological, and economic infrastructures. STU-1503 faculty: Rahul Mehrotra and Charlotte Malterre-Barthes.
